ValidationRule.description: Enforce that the Case.Product__r.Iko_Product_Family__c matches the Case.Plant_Period__r.Product_Family__c value This validation rule only applies to Commercial and Residential claims.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Product__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Plant_Period__c)), Plant_Period__r.Product_Family__c <> Product__r.Iko_Product_Family__c , OR( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Commercial_Claim', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Residential_Claim' ), NOT ($Profile.Name = "System Administrator") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Product's Iko Product Family must match the Plant Period's Product Family
